013package org.apache.juneau.http.annotation;
014
015import java.lang.annotation.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
018
019/**
020 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link HasQuery @HasQuery} annotation.
021 *
022 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
023 * </ul>
024 */
025public class HasQueryAnnotation {
026
027   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
028   // Static
029   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
030
031   /** Default value */
032   public static final HasQuery DEFAULT = create().build();
033
034   /**
035    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
036    *
037    * @return A new builder object.
038    */
039   public static Builder create() {
040      return new Builder();
041   }
042
043   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
044   // Builder
045   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
046
047   /**
048    * Builder class.
049    *
050    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
051    *    <li class='jm'>{@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder#annotations(Annotation...)}
052    * </ul>
053    */
054   public static class Builder extends AnnotationBuilder<Builder> {
055
056      String name="", value="";
057
058      /**
059       * Constructor.
060       */
061      protected Builder() {
062         super(HasQuery.class);
063      }
064
065      /**
066       * Instantiates a new {@link HasQuery @HasQuery} object initialized with this builder.
067       *
068       * @return A new {@link HasQuery @HasQuery} object.
069       */
070      public HasQuery build() {
071         return new Impl(this);
072      }
073
074      /**
075       * Sets the {@link HasQuery#name} property on this annotation.
076       *
077       * @param value The new value for this property.
078       * @return This object.
079       */
080      public Builder name(String value) {
081         this.name = value;
082         return this;
083      }
084
085      /**
086       * Sets the {@link HasQuery#value} property on this annotation.
087       *
088       * @param value The new value for this property.
089       * @return This object.
090       */
091      public Builder value(String value) {
092         this.value = value;
093         return this;
094      }
095
096      // <FluentSetters>
097      // </FluentSetters>
098   }
099
100   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
101   // Implementation
102   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
103
104   private static class Impl extends AnnotationImpl implements HasQuery {
105
106      private final String name, value;
107
108      Impl(Builder b) {
109         super(b);
110         this.name = b.name;
111         this.value = b.value;
112         postConstruct();
113      }
114
115      @Override
116      public String name() {
117         return name;
118      }
119
120      @Override
121      public String value() {
122         return value;
123      }
124   }
125}
